about_the_game:
Enjoy hundreds of puzzle games from the comfort of your PC!

Welcome to Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise, the ultimate brain training and development game designed to challenge and sharpen your mind! With an extensive collection of dozens of different puzzles like Fill Lines, Sudoku, Nonogram, Rolling Cube, and more, this game is your go-to destination for boosting your cognitive skills and unlocking your full mental potential.

Remind yourself of your brain’s incredible capabilities as you dive into a world of captivating challenges. Whether you're a puzzle enthusiast or simply looking for a fun way to exercise your brain, Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise offers a diverse range of mind-bending workouts that will keep you entertained for hours on end.

Features:

  • Train your brain with an array of clever puzzles.

  • Expand your mind as you elevate your cognitive abilities.

  • Engage in word, numbers, and trivia puzzles that flow seamlessly.

  • Dozens of different puzzle games to keep you focused and engaged.

  • Dive into the depths of Sudoku and other number-based challenges.

  • Unlock a sense of calm and focus while solving intricate puzzles.

  • Hundreds of different unique levels to conquer, each more captivating than the last.

  • Hints and clues to guide you through tricky sections.

  • Earn in-game rewards that add an extra layer of excitement to your journey.

  • Climb the ranks with the leaderboard system, showcasing your mastery.

  • Explore puzzles that span different difficulty levels, from relaxing to expert.

Never Get Bored:

Played Connect puzzles for hours and want something new? Switch to Fill Shapes, then tackle Sudoku or Pyramid. Cardinal, Color Neighbors, Mirrors, and more are waiting for you. You can't get bored here! Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise is a brain training program that improves your mind’s focus, memory, processing speed, and more. Install Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise on Steam and enjoy different difficulty levels like easy, medium, hard, or expert!

For Everyone:

Featuring an intuitive and user-friendly interface with smooth mouse-and-keyboard controls, Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise caters to individuals of all ages and skill levels. Engage in a variety of puzzle categories, including logic, memory, math, spatial awareness, and more. Each puzzle is meticulously crafted to provide a unique and stimulating experience, ensuring that you never encounter repetitive or monotonous gameplay.

Never-Ending Fun:

Immerse yourself in the never-ending fun of Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise, where your journey to mental mastery is accompanied by a sense of calm and accomplishment. Embrace the thrill of solving mind-boggling puzzles, boost your cognitive skills, and unlock a world of endless possibilities. Your mind holds the key to unlocking these limitless possibilities – let the flow of puzzles and clever challenges elevate you to new heights.

Elevate your mind with the ultimate destination for brain training and cognitive development!

Our game offers a wide array of challenging puzzles, including Sudoku, 2048, Nonogram, and many more, designed to stimulate your mind and improve your cognitive abilities. Install now on Steam and embark on a journey to elevate your mind to new heights with Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise!

highlighted.name: Claim the daily login reward 5 times
Complete 50 levels without using any hint

name: Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise is a brain-training puzzle game featuring dozens of challenges like Sudoku, Nonogram, and Fill Lines. Players engage their cognitive skills across hundreds of levels, solving puzzles while improving memory, focus, and problem-solving abilities.
